org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class JFFCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.XMLCodec
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.JFFCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Codec

    public class JFFCodec
extends XMLCodec
    A JFFCodec is an XML codec with the ability to encode/decode objects to/from JFLAP file format (JFF).
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
